title: The Definitive Meaning of Quick Turnaround in Modern Manufacturing: Metrics, STOs, and Operational Excellence

hero_image.alt: Hero image for The Definitive Meaning of Quick Turnaround in Modern Manufacturing: Metrics, STOs, and Operational Excellence

image_prompt: A wide-angle, photo-realistic professional shot of a modern manufacturing facility floor. In the foreground, a diverse group of three maintenance professionals (one woman, two men) are standing near a large industrial motor and conveyor system. They are wearing clean, appropriate PPE: white hard hats, clear safety glasses, and high-visibility orange vests over work shirts. One technician is pointing toward a specific part of the machinery, while another holds a ruggedized tablet (shown from the back, no screen visible). The lighting is bright and industrial, highlighting the clean, well-maintained environment. The background shows a blur of high-tech production lines, conveying a sense of organized, high-efficiency operations. No text or logos are visible on the equipment or clothing. Full-body view of the professionals.
